hero.description: Dedicated to promoting education, technology, and social welfare in Nepal through innovative programs and community engagement.

about.title: About Jaro Kilo Foundation
about.missionText: To empower communities through education, technology, and sustainable development initiatives that create lasting positive impact.
about.visionText: A prosperous Nepal where every individual has access to quality education and opportunities for growth.
about.valuesText: Integrity, Innovation, Inclusivity, and Impact guide everything we do.
